00013 + (id)getLocation {
00014   return [[DKDeferredLocation alloc] init:YES];

00019 @implementation DKDeferredLocation
00020 
00021 @synthesize location;
00022 
00023 - (id)init:(BOOL)fetcOnlyOne { // TODO: respect fetchOnlyOne or numberOfUpdates
00024   if ((self = [super initWithCanceller:nil])) {
00025     location = nil;
00026     onlyOne = fetcOnlyOne;
00027     updates = 0;
00028     _manager = [[[CLLocationManager alloc] init] retain];
00029     [_manager setDelegate:self];
00030     [_manager startUpdatingLocation];
00031     // timeout
00032     [DKDeferred callLater:10.0 func:callbackTS(self, _timeout:)];
00033   }
00034   return self; 
00035 }
00036 
00037 - (void)_timeout:(id)arg {
00038   if (fired == -1) {
00039     [_manager stopUpdatingLocation];
00040     [self errback:
00041      [NSError
00042       errorWithDomain:@"DKDeferredLocation"
00043       code:4020 
00044       userInfo:dict_(@"Get location timed out", @"message")]];
00045   }
00046 }
00047 
00048 - (void)locationManager:(CLLocationManager *)manager
00049     didUpdateToLocation:(CLLocation *)newLocation
00050            fromLocation:(CLLocation *)oldLocation {
00051   //  location = [newLocation retain];
00052   //  if (onlyOne) {
00053   //    [manager stopUpdatingLocation];
00054   //    [manager release];
00055   //  }
00056   updates += 1;
00057   if (updates > 1) {
00058     [manager stopUpdatingLocation];
00059     location = [newLocation retain];
00060     [self callback:location];
00061   }
00062 }
00063 
00064 - (void)locationManager:(CLLocationManager *)manager 
00065        didFailWithError:(NSError *)error {
00066   [manager stopUpdatingLocation];
00067   [self errback:error];
00068 }
00069 
00070 @end
